Gallery.Name: Basic Diagram
Gallery.Description: Create the most commonly used basic diagrams with predefined templates and symbols.

Templates.Name: Block Diagram
Templates.Description: Contains geometric shapes and directional lines for feedback loops and for functional docomposition, hierarchical, data structure, data flow block, and data block diagrams.

Templates.Name: Arrows
Templates.Description: Shows the required order of tasks in a project or process, the best schedule for the entire project, and potential scheduling and resource problems and their solutions.

Templates.Description: Create your timeline diagrams online with Edraw Max

Templates.Name: Circle-Spoke Diagram
Templates.Description: Illustrate that every spoke is equal in value.

Templates.Name: Circular Diagram
Templates.Description: Contains chart and graph shapes for financial and sales reports, profit and loss statements, budgets, statistical analyses, accounting tasks, market projections, and annual reports.

Templates.Name: Lists
Templates.Description: Used to show non-sequential or grouped blocks of information. Maximizes both horizontal and vertical display space for shapes.

Templates.Name: Venn Diagram
Templates.Description: Show all possible logical relations between a finite collection of sets.

Templates.Description: Shows the required order of tasks in a project or process, the best schedule for the entire project, and potential scheduling and resource problems and their solutions

Templates.Name: Basic Flowchart
Templates.Description: Create flowcharts, top-down diagrams, information tracking diagrams, process planning diagrams and structure prediction diagrams.

Templates.Name: Data Flow Diagram
Templates.Description: Create structured analysis, information flow, process-oriented, data-oriented, and data process diagrams as well as data flowcharts.

Templates.Description: Show the relationship between a business process and the organizational or functional units, such as departments, that are responsible for steps in that process.

Templates.Name: BPMN
Templates.Description: Create a flowchart that follows the Business Process Modeling Notation 1.1 standard.

Templates.Name: Event Flow Diagram
Templates.Description: Depict the relationship between events and process.

Templates.Name: IDEF Diagram
Templates.Description: Create hierarchical diagrams using IEDF process charting models for model configuration management, need and benefit analyses, requirements definitions, and continuous improvement models.

Templates.Name: SDL Diagram
Templates.Description: Create object-oriented diagrams for communications and telecommunications systems and networks, using Specification and Description Language (SDL). Based on CCITT specifications.

Templates.Name: Workflow Diagram
Templates.Description: Create diagrams of information flow, business process automation, business process re-engineering, accounting, management, and huaman resources tasks. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.

Templates.Name: Audit Diagram
Templates.Description: Create auditing diagrams for accounting, financial management, fiscal information tracking, money management, deciscon flowcharts, and financial inventories. Document 6 Sigma and ISO 9000 processes.
